original_text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.
korean_text: 그 날에 그가 강림하사 그의 성도들에게서 영광을 받으시고 모든 믿는 자들에게서 놀랍게 여김을 얻으시리니 이는 (우리의 증거가 너희에게 믿어졌음이라)

sentences.original_text: When he shall come to be glorified
because our testimony among you was believed
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 증거가 너희 가운데서 믿어졌기 때문
